description: Regulators find “immediate jeopardy” to patient safety that posed a “high risk of serious harm, injury and death.”

refusing to eat, drink and take medications for her schizophrenia
Smokey Point sends Rosemary to Providence Regional Medical Center’s emergency room for “abnormal labs”
A Smokey Point staff member recommends Rosemary “be sent to a more medical psych unit”
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s emergency

description: Patient taken to ER with “intractable headache” a week after doctor had ordered CT scan that was never scheduled
Patient punches nurse in head and face
Patient arrested after punching another patient in head and face

descriptionHidden: Smokey Point sends Rosemary to Northwest Hospital to be evaluated for admission,

description: Patient complains to DOH of understaffing and "extreme amount of violence by patients."
Patient taken to ER after overdose
Christina Perry, a nurse, resigns citing understaffing and unsafe conditions
Hospital error results in giving patient medication meant for another, requiring medical follow-up
A patient with cornea scarring told Department of Health he hadn't seen an opthamologist despite a doctor’s order more than two weeks before
Alfie Alvarado-Ramos, director of state Department of Veterans Affairs, emcees ceremony for new military unit at Smokey Point
Regulators return to inspect Smokey Point and find serious violations “resulted in an unsafe environment for patients”

descriptionHidden: Rosemary falls at Smokey Point and is taken to the emergency room at Cascade Valley Hospital, where she is diagnosed with a broken arm

description: Former Smokey Point pharmacist files complaint to DOH about lack of staffing

descriptionHidden: Smokey Point records refer to her as being “bedbound”
Smokey Point records show she has developed a bed sore
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the fifth time for refusing to eat, drink or take medication

Smokey Point sends her to Providence a sixth time and refuses to accept her back Smokey Point sends her to Providence a sixth time Smokey Point sends her to Providence a sixth time and refuses to accept her back

description: Regulators return to inspect Smokey Point and find serious violations “resulted in an unsafe environment for patients”
US HealthVest CEO pitches a third psychiatric hospital in Washington, pledging to boost the region’s mental-health workforce and saying Smokey Point “demonstrates our strategies are successful.”

descriptionHidden: Rosemary Torgesen dies, with malnutrition given as the primary cause on her death certificate
